data.name: ベロちゅー特化　ボクの彼女が遊びに来たよ Demo

fullgame.name: [Tongue kissing Specialization] My girlfriend's here for a visit.

data.supported_languages:
English, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese*, Korean
*languages with full audio support

content_descriptors.notes:
If you make the wrong decision, the woman will hurt you.
If you do not make a mistake, you will have consensual sex with a woman, all with my consent.
